about_the_game:
Welcome to the tranquil world of Crabs, the most relaxing way to experience the joys (and quirks) of owning a hermit crab—without the mess of a real-life tank.

This charming simulator puts you in the role of a dedicated hermit crab caretaker. Your mission? Keep your little crustacean friend happy, healthy, and thriving in their cozy habitat.

Key Features:

  • Care for Your Crab: Feed them, provide fresh water, and keep the tank clean to ensure your crab is living their best life.

  •  Collect Shells: Using steam inventory service you can collect and trade shells. Log on once a day to collect a drop for a new shell designs. 

  • Realtime: Crab life is based on real time. Remember to check on your hermit crab and refill his food and water to keep him alive and healthy. No need to keep the game open in between. 

  • Minigames: Play minigames with the crab to collect pearls to buy new decorations and other crab necessities. 

Perfect for anyone looking for a low-pressure gameplay experience, Crabs captures the simple joy of caring for a hermit crab. Whether you're a seasoned hermit crab enthusiast or just curious about these little creatures, this game invites you to take a step back, slow down, and enjoy life's tiny wonders.

Take a breath, settle in, and make your hermit crab feel at home. Available soon on Steam.
